mapper.select: select C.*, F.renamed, F.ext, U.nick, decode(good, null, 0, good) as good, decode(bad, null, 0, bad) as bad, decode(goodbad, null, 0, goodbad) as goodbad from comments C, (select * from files where type=1) F, users U, (select ref, sum(decode(good_bad, 1, 1, 0)) as good, sum(decode(good_bad, 2, 1, 0)) as bad, sum(decode(good_bad, 1, 1, 0))-sum(decode(good_bad, 2, 1, 0)) as goodbad from recommend where type=2 group by ref) R where C.ref = #{no} and C.id = F.ref and C.id = U.id and C.no = R.ref(+) order by goodbad desc, C.no desc
